page.shortlink: api objects letter object saveas method

description.p: The Letter.SaveAs() method prints Layout_Name to file in PDF, HTML, RTF, or TXT formats. If no format is specified, the PDF format is used.

page.note: For web applications use the a5w_report_saveas(), a5w_label_saveas(), or a5w_letter_saveas() functions.
page.prototype: Letter.SaveAs as C ( Layout_Name as C [, Format as C [, Filter_Expression as C [, Order_Expression as C [, Output_Filename as C [, Open_Application as L [, PrintOptions as P [, Arguments as SQL::Arguments [, Options as P ]]]]]]]] )

discussion.p: If you specify an optional *[xb:Filter_Expression]*, the only records matching the filter are printed. (In addition to the filter specified here, the layout may have a filter defined within the layout definition).

The layout is printed to *[xb:Output_Filename]*. If *[xb:Output_Filename]* is not specified, the layout is printed to a file with the same name as the *[xb:Layout_Name]* in the same folder as the database.
For more information and detailed description of parameters, see [Report.SaveAs Function].
